nodes.excerpt: This file includes a bunch of experiments with interactive components in Figma to create some motion in your design. You can download Figma Beta to use interactive components.
nodes.title: Motion - Interactive components in Figma to create motion
nodes.author: Pavan Kusuma

nodes.excerpt: Supabase is an open source Firebase alternative. Today we are launching one of our most requested features - Storage! You can upload files, programmatically or via the dashboard, and make them available in your Supabase app.
nodes.title: Supabase Storage - Store and serve any type of digital content
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: Thunder Client is Rest API Client Extension for Visual Studio Code, with simple and clean design. The extension makes api testing very easy with Scriptless GUI based testing.
nodes.title: Thunder Client - Rest API client for VS Code, lightweight Postman alternative
nodes.author: Ranga Vadhineni

nodes.excerpt: Paragon Connect allows developers to embed user-facing SaaS integrations into their product in minutes. Setup the Paragon SDK once and instantly integrate your product with popular SaaS apps like Salesforce, HubSpot, Slack, JIRA, and more.
nodes.title: Paragon Connect - Build embedded, native SaaS integrations in minutes
nodes.author: Brandon Foo

nodes.excerpt: Streamâ€™s UI + SDKs for in-app chat allow you to build a beautiful and scalable chat experience in hours. 50+ handcrafted screens for Figma & Sketch. UI components for Flutter, React Native, Kotlin & Swift. Free maker accounts available for side projects.
nodes.title: Mobile Chat Kit - UI kits & sample apps for building in-app mobile chat
nodes.author: Alex Iskold

nodes.author: Mayur Sojitra

nodes.excerpt: Create charts with https://styled-components.com/. A react lib built with TS and almost no dependencies (no d3 and all this stuff). Import some default chart components as Bar, Path, BarGroup, restyle them and add back to the chart ğŸ˜-> profit.
nodes.title: Styled chart - Create beautiful charts with styled-components
nodes.author: Vova Tereschenko

nodes.excerpt: Shuffle is an online editor for Tailwind CSS, Bootstrap, Bulma, and Material-UI. Today, we are launching our marketplace and two new UI libraries for Tailwind! https://shuffle.dev/marketplace
nodes.title: UI Libraries by Shuffle - A marketplace for busy front-end developers
nodes.author: Dawid Andrzejewski

nodes.excerpt: It's hard to focus when you're stuck at home. 5am coder brings programmers, developers & makers together at 5am for session of deep, focused work.
nodes.title: 5am Coder - Wake up and code alongside developers & makers
nodes.author: Karl Lee

nodes.excerpt: Firework brings the TikTok/IG/Snap Story experience into any Website or any app. Raised $55M in Series A, we aim to unite the open internet (decentralized and open) to fight against the giant social media (centralized and closed)
nodes.title: Firework Web Story Platform - B2B Version of TikTok

nodes.excerpt: Codeally brings candidate management, automatic assessment, and coding together to give technical hiring teams superpowers.
nodes.title: CodeAlly - Automate dev hiring with real-life tasks

nodes.excerpt: GPU.LAND offers GPU instances for Deep Learning â€” at dirt-cheap prices. How cheap? Up to 80% cheaper vs major cloud providers. We believe everyone, and not just "Big Tech", should be able to train AI models. So we built the cheapest place on the web to do it.
nodes.title: GPU.LAND - Affordable cloud GPUs for deep learning

nodes.excerpt: Macro helps teams supercharge their manual and repetitive processes. Our powerful checklist allows teams to quickly document processes, assign tasks, track progress, and automate common actions.

nodes.excerpt: A minimalist Flutter framework inspired from TailwindCSS and SwiftUI for rapidly building custom designs.

nodes.excerpt: Bring your projects up to a whole new level using Artify's illustrations plugin, now available directly inside Figma. Through this new plugin you can search & import over 5000 illustrations with over 70 different design styles directly in your figma projects.
nodes.title: 5000+ illustrations for Figma by Artify - Figma plugin with 5000 illustrations in 70+ design styles
nodes.author: Juan Sarmiento

nodes.excerpt: The pack you've been looking for to bring your website or app to the next level. This pack contain 100 animated icons, rendered in svg, ready to be integrated to your website. The pack will be regularily updated with new versions of the icons to fit all your needs.
nodes.title: Iconimations - Svg animated icons pack, ready to be integrated to your site

nodes.excerpt: Showwcase is a social network built and optimised for developers. Developers can connect, share their knowledge and showcase their projects with like-minded individuals. For developer content creators, you can make money via paid subscribers.
nodes.title: Showwcase - A social network for developers that lets you make money
nodes.author: Rong Liew

nodes.excerpt: Accelerate your development & build fully customizable video-based applications with the performance, scale, and reliability of Zoom's industry leading video-first communications platform. â € Get started at no charge with 10,000 session minutes per month.
nodes.title: Video SDK from Zoom - Build fully customizable video-based apps

nodes.excerpt: Developers have been using the Grouparoo UI to set up automated data movement from their databases to cloud-based tools like Mailchimp. Grouparoo now supports declarative code to set up this pipeline so you manage data sync just like you would any other app.
nodes.title: Grouparoo 2.0 - Integrate with marketing tools using low-code configuration
nodes.author: Hiten Shah

nodes.excerpt: VS Code Theme Studio enables you to quickly and easily design your own VS Code theme in an intuitive, user-friendly, web-based interface. No more messing around with nasty JSON files, editing raw hex color codes, and tweaking settings.
nodes.title: VS Code Theme Studio - Create your own VS Code theme easily, within your browser

nodes.excerpt: What if programming was about ideas, not semicolons? Compose, abstract, generalise. Start from top down or bottom up and refine as you go. With Nodes, programming feels like sketching on a canvas.
nodes.title: Nodes - Thinking space for exploring ideas with code
nodes.author: Sonu Jung

nodes.excerpt: Recipes are a new way to create step-by-step code walkthroughs right in your ReadMe documentation. By helping you showcase the best use cases for your APIs, it's easy for developers to get started faster while saving your team time on developer support.
nodes.title: ReadMe Recipes - Step-by-step code walkthroughs for your API
nodes.author: Gregory Koberger
